long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BroTime is a Chrome browser extension that helps you stay in control of your time while browsing the web. It tracks your activity across multiple windows and tabs, providing you with interactive charts and tables to analyze your daily and weekly browsing trends. With its advanced idle detection, it can also keep track of video streaming activity, and works on any website, as well as local files like PDFs.
